parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Name of template with full directory path

parameters.name: PaperSize
parameters.description: Paper size as defined in swDwgPaperSizes_e

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Custom paper width if PaperSize is set to swDwgPapersUserDefined

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Custom paper height if PaperSize is set to swDwgPapersUserDefined

title: ISldWorks.IGetTemplateSizes
description: Gets the sheet properties from a template document.
signature:
System.Boolean IGetTemplateSizes( 
   System.String
FileName
,
   out System.Int32
PaperSize
,
   out System.Double
Width
,
   out System.Double
Height
)

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Name of template with full directory path

parameters.name: PaperSize
parameters.description: Paper size as defined in swDwgPaperSizes_e

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Custom paper width if PaperSize is set to swDwgPapersUserDefined

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Custom paper height if PaperSize is set to swDwgPapersUserDefined

returns: True if the operation is successful, false if not
